channel.title: CVE Feed for Accusoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Accusoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28393|2023-09-25T17:00:06.924Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tif_processing_dng_channel_count functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39453|2023-10-09T18:43:41.669Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A use-after-free vulnerability exists in the tif_parse_sub_IFD functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can deliver this file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32614|2023-09-25T17:00:08.171Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the create_png_object functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32653|2023-09-25T17:00:06.556Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the dcm_pixel_data_decode functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-32284|2023-09-25T17:00:07.736Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the tiff_planar_adobe functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-23567|2023-09-25T17:00:08.679Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the CreateDIBfromPict functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-40163|2023-09-25T17:00:07.400Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the allocate_buffer_for_jpeg_decoding functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-35002|2023-09-25T17:00:09.033Z -- accusoft -- imagegear
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the pictwread functionality of Accusoft ImageGear 20.1. A specially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
